rules: Rule1: Provided that the research lab has funding from the government, then the research lab receives a grant from the foundation.

Rule2: If the researcher uses an anemometer, then under the condition that it is not the case that the researcher has a protocol for safety standards or the research lab receives a grant from the foundation, it follows that the equipment does not cause damage due to a storm.

Rule21: If the researcher studies solar radiation, then either the researcher operates at a field station or if the researcher performs a test on a solar array, then the researcher has skill in solar design.

Rule24: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the supervisor conducts an inspection of the facility, then provided that the researcher secures the site perimeter, the researcher does not violate regulations during testing, then the regulator imposes a fine on the facility.

Rule25: If it is not the case that the technician calibrates instrument sensors or the technician monitors system performance or the technician is authorized for maintenance, then the technician reports data to the database.
